title: Neurasynk – Adaptive Brain Network Neurofeedback via Deep Reinforcement Learning in a Dynamic Closed-Loop Protocol
summary: A real-time, closed-loop neurofeedback system leveraging DRL to dynamically modulate brain networks by synchronizing EEG-based connectivity features with adaptive feedback strategies.
impact: Personalized cognitive modulation via real-time feedback

title: End-to-End Stock Market Technical Indicator Parameters Optimization and Performance Analysis: A Dynamic Approach
summary: A framework for automating parameter optimization and rigorous validation of indicator-based trading strategies to enable smarter decisions under changing market regimes.
impact: Rigorous evaluation protocol for trading strategies

title: SIOPA – Stock Indicator Optimization and Predictive Analysis Framework for Financial Time Series
summary: A DNN framework that classifies indicator parameters (worst→special) using historical data and backtesting metrics such as Sharpe ratio and max drawdown to streamline optimization.

title: FinDRL: Financial Deep Reinforcement Learning for Stock Trading and Portfolio Management
summary: A reinforcement learning framework for adaptive portfolio decision-making in dynamic markets, aiming to maximize returns while managing risk.

title: FinDRL – Integrated Framework for Stock Breakout Trading and Portfolio Risk Management: A Hybrid Model Approach
summary: A hybrid ML framework for breakout trading combining unsupervised pattern discovery and supervised prediction with dynamic risk management.
